text:
Hello,
I am working on deploying a serverless function to use with a Custom UI Extension. I have an Enterprise account but I am being told "[ERROR] The post to 'app.functions' in account REDACTED failed. hubId REDACTED does not have access to serverless builds." The appropriate hubId is mentioned, but it seemed prudent to redact it.
Does anyone have an idea of what needs to be done in this situation?
Other answers I've seen involved DMing a particular person the HubId, however, I am not sure if that is still the right person to DM about this or not as those messages were over a year old.
